DOC.detailed_description: The purpose trial examine smokeless tobacco ( Oliwer Twist ) combine group support ( 15-20 per group ) might increase smoke cessation rate compare group support cold turkey smokers.The test product use 7 week . Seven group meeting plan first 3 month follow bu follow-up session 6 12 month . The design open , randomize . Assessment ECG , blood pressure , body-weight , carbon monoxide , lung function , stress , quality life , withdrawal symptom , adverse event plasma nicotine , cotinine thiocyante entry 4 week etc .
